infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ActivePortland uses the camera to let you take a profile photo, helping other activity partners recognize you at meetups and creating a safer, more connected community experience.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ActivePortland accesses your photo library to let you choose a profile photo, helping other activity partners recognize you at meetups and creating a safer, more connected community experience.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Save your new profile photo to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ActivePortland uses your location to show distances to nearby activity partners, helping you find people close to you for convenient meetups and building local community connections.
